description: A lightweight workhorse in the mountains, the Recon Stretch LT Pants are built to provide dependable protection for skiers and riders looking to hit either side of the rope. Featuring a slimmed down fit when compared to their Recon Stretch line, the Recon Stretch LT Pants combine BD.dry waterproof/ breathable solution with a lightweight ripstop fabric for a best-in-class three-layer combo of durability, protection, and minimal weight.
name: Black Diamond Recon LT Stretch Pants - Mens

specs.value: BD.dry™ 3L, 40d Nylon Stretch with PFC-Free DWR Finish - 93% Nylon, 7% Elastane, 141 g
